title: Housing
description: Rent or mortgage payments, property taxes, and home-related expenses.

title: Food
description: Expenses related to groceries, dining out, and food supplies.

title: Utilities
description: Monthly bills for electricity, water, gas, and other essential services.

title: Transportation
description: Costs associated with commuting, public transportation, or vehicle maintenance.

title: Healthcare
description: Medical bills, insurance premiums, and expenses related to health and wellness.

title: Bills & Recharge
description: Payments for phone bills, internet recharge, and other recurring bills.

title: Insurance
description: Insurance premiums for health, life, auto, and other insurance policies.

title: Savings
description: Allocated funds for savings and investments.

title: Clothing
description: Fashionable apparel for men, women, and children.

title: Entertainment
description: Expenditure on movies, concerts, hobbies, and leisure activities.

title: Technology
description: Electronics, gadgets, and expenses related to technology.

title: Travel
description: Costs associated with vacations, flights, hotels, and travel activities.

title: Education
description: Tuition fees, books, and other educational expenses.

title: Books
description: A wide range of books across different genres and authors.

title: Sports and Outdoors
description: Equipment and gear for various sports and outdoor activities.

title: Furniture
description: Various types of furniture for home and office use.

title: Home Improvement
description: Expenses related to home renovations and improvements.

title: Gifts
description: Spending on gifts for birthdays, holidays, and special occasions.

title: Subscriptions
description: Monthly subscription services for streaming, magazines, and other subscriptions.

title: Pet Care
description: Expenses for pet food, veterinary care, and pet-related supplies.

title: Other Expense
description: Miscellaneous expenditures not covered by specific categories.
